features: Express Love Effortlessly: Elevate your entryway with our "Love You Bye" sign - a heartwarming way to express affection as you leave. This versatile decor piece is perfect for hallway or entryway walls. Infuse your space with novelty and charm using this delightful sign. It's not just decor; it's a heartfelt message

Versatile Installation - Our product is designed to be versatile in installation. You can choose to use double-sided tape or damage-free adhesive strips for installation to ensure your walls remain undamaged.𝐍𝐎𝐓𝐈𝐂𝐄: 𝐏𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐢𝐬 𝐍𝐨𝐭 𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐝𝐞 𝐠𝐥𝐮𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐝𝐨𝐮𝐛𝐥𝐞-𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐚𝐩𝐞

Flexible Placement Options: Install it above your front door, on the door panel, or any wall you desire. We offer two sizes: a small 21.6-inch width to fit most 30-inch door widths and a medium 31.5-inch width for larger entries. Best Thanksgiving, Christmas house warming gifts for friends
Crafted for Durability: Meticulously crafted to withstand the test of time, this sign blends seamlessly with various decor styles, adding a touch of class to your hallway
24 Hours Sales Service - If you have any problems with your purchase, please feel free to contact us. We would try our best to solve your problems
body.description: Installation Instructions Versatile Installation - Our product is designed to be versatile in installation. You can choose to use double-sided tape or damage-free adhesive strips for installation to ensure your walls remain undamaged. DIY Decorating Fun - We encourage customers to enjoy the fun of DIY decorating. You can arrange the wall plaques according to your personal preferences and creativity. Green Materials - Our product is made from recyclable materials, which may have a slight odor. You can use harmless adhesives like double-sided tape or damage-free adhesive strips.No Missing Parts - We sure that the product you received is complete. While we don't provide glue or tape, we ensure the integrity of the product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Installation Steps: Choose the desired location on your wall for the wall plaques. Clean the selected area to ensure it's free of dust or debris. If using double-sided tape: Apply the tape evenly to the back of each wall plaque. If using damage-free adhesive strips: Follow the manufacturer's instructions for applying the strips Carefully position each wall plaque on the wall. Press firmly to secure the wall plaques in place. Allow the adhesive to set for the recommended time before adding any additional weight or decoration Installation Instructions Versatile Installation - Our product is designed to be versatile in installation. You can choose to use double-sided tape or damage-free adhesive strips for installation to ensure your walls remain undamaged. DIY Decorating Fun - We encourage customers to enjoy the fun of DIY decorating. You can arrange the wall plaques according to your personal preferences and creativity. Green Materials - Our product is made from recyclable materials, which may have a slight odor. You can use harmless adhesives like double-sided tape or damage-free adhesive strips.No Missing Parts - We sure that the product you received is complete. While we don't provide glue or tape, we ensure the integrity of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect remind for my kiddos leaving home
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I had to find some double sided tape and cut it to size in order to put it up but it’s the perfect size for just above the front door so my kiddos get a reminder when they rush out the door without saying goodbye. They do seem a bit flimsy so be careful when handling them but they’ve been up for a few weeks now and no issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pay Attention to the Size
reviews.reviewText: The picture of the product is very deceiving. I did not pay attention to the size, or the fact that there’s no feature to be able to actually hang them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't love this enough!
reviews.reviewText: "Love you bye" is said often at our house, so when I saw this... I HAD TO HAVE IT. I love it and it looks perfect above the front door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER simple and cute
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this. My mom and I when we get off the phone always say "love you bye" so I had to have this. I put it up with small double sided tape circles I also found on amazon. It's light weight and super simple. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thought it would be slightly bigger. I bought it as a gift for a friend, cause that's what we say to each other. She just used it in a craft and made her own sign with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While this super cute, the only thing they could have improved was including a better way to hang or attaching together so it was easier to hang. It’s still one of my favorites decorations anyway though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect little addition to my apartment and cute sign for people to see as they leave. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made for me
reviews.reviewText: Okay. So.... my walls are kinda beige(?), so I love that the words are black. The font style adds a modern, chic touch as well. I had some random 3M tape hanging around the house and that's what I used to stick the letters to the wall. "Love you, bye" is something I say every day to close friends and family, so when I saw this, I knew it was made for me and I had to have it! All of my friends love it when they come over. Very proud of owning this decoration now; I love the simplicity of it so much.
